p: The structures of all newly prepared amidino substituted benzimidazole/benzothiazole derivatives were confirmed by means of 1H and 13 C NMR spectroscopy. NMR analysis based on the values of chemical shifts and H–H coupling constants in the 1H spectra confirmed the structures of compounds. Furthermore, 13 C NMR chemical shifts were consistent with the suggested structures. Also, IR spectroscopy was used for the monitoring of Pinner reaction due to the synthesis of main precursors 2 and 3.
